summary.para: Deprecated. Gets the pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) associated with the travel entry.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Invokes the travel entry, navigating to that page.

param.name: punk
param.para: The representing the browser or frame within which the travel operation generating the entry is taking place.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: punk
param.para: The representing the browser or frame within which the travel operation generating the entry is taking place.

param.name: fIsLocalAnchor
param.para: The value specifying whether the new entry is a local anchor.
The entry is an anchor link within the same page.
The entry is another page or an anchor on another page.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Deprecated. Exposes methods to identify, invoke, and update an individual item in the browser's travel history.

remarks.para: Travel entries represented by ITravelEntry are created and maintained internally by the travel log (). Calling applications rarely use ITravelEntry directly.
Note ITravelEntry may not be supported in versions of Windows later than Windows XP.
